details:
scsi: lpfc: Address NULL pointer dereference after starget_to_rport()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit 68fcff1127e4995ddbd4b6861892a25c23db3f70, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit bb21fc9911eea92afd476f7e64b327716e042a25. For more details please see the references link.
summary: scsi: lpfc: Address NULL pointer dereference after starget_to_rport()
